snippet: Secretary of Defense Ashton B. Carter takes his bridge-building message to Silicon Valley despite skepticism among some in the tech community.
abstract: Defense Dept is vigorously pursuing Silicon Valley's artificial intelligence technology as way to maintain military edge in future over countries like Russia and China; Def Sec Ashton B Carter, whose 'Third Offset' strategy emphasizes computer-based, high-tech weapons, makes fourth trip to region since he took post year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of Defense Ashton B. Carter takes his bridge-building message to Silicon Valley despite skepticism among some in the tech community.

headline.main: Pentagon Turns to Silicon Valley for Edge in Artificial Intelligence
headline.print_headline: Pentagon  Courts Tech for Robotic Weaponry

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
